data.name: 3DF Zephyr Lite Steam Edition Demo
data.detailed_description:
3DF Zephyr allows you to automatically and easily create 3D models from photos.

The process is completely automatic and no coded targets, manual editing or special equipments are needed: with a user friendly interface and the possibility to export in many common 3D formats, 3DF Zephyr is the perfect tool for 3D modelling from reality.

3DF Zephyr Lite Steam Edition Demo (also known as 3DF Zephyr Free edition) allows you to learn photogrammetry (or to open .ZEP files generated with any other 3DF Zephyr version) completely free of charge!

You can process up to 50 images and export only textured meshes. Other limitations apply (for the full list, please visit http://zephyr.3dflow.net)

Please note that 3DF Zephyr runs only on Microsoft Windows x64 operating systems (Vista and later)

data.short_description: 3DF Zephyr allows you to automatically and easily create 3D models from photos.The process is completely automatic and no coded targets, manual editing or special equipments are needed: with a user friendly interface and the possibility to export in many common 3D formats, 3DF Zephyr is the perfect tool for 3D modelling from reality.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/8.1/8/7/Vista 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video card with 256MB vram
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/8.1/8/7/Vista 64 bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA video card with > 2GB vram and CUDA capabilities > 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is strongly advised.
